                 <li id="user_review_11097400" class="review user_review"> 
                  <div class="review_btm review_btm_r">
                   <div class="review_btm review_btm_l">
                    <div class="review_top review_top_r">
                     <div class="review_top review_top_l"> 
                      <div class="review_content"> 
                       <div class="review_section"> 
                        <div class="review_stats"> 
                         <div class="review_critic"> 
                          <div class="name"> 
                           <a href="/user/vlekje5">vlekje5</a> 
                          </div> 
                          <div class="date">
                           Mar 11, 2020
                          </div> 
                         </div> 
                         <div class="review_grade"> 
                          <div class="metascore_w user medium game mixed indiv">
                           6
                          </div> 
                         </div> 
                        </div> 
                        <div class="review_body"> 
                         <span class="inline_expand_collapse inline_collapsed" id="review_blurb_11097400"><span class="blurb blurb_collapsed">I think wc3 reforged is very flawed. However with the amount of people giving this game a 0/10 i can't really take those "reviews" seriously. <br>This game is NOT a 0/10 game. <br> I personally picked it up just before it fully released. Somwhere in the beta, like many players warcraftIII was my favorite game growing up, mainly for the custom games. Contrary to what many people here claim</span><span class="blurb blurb_expanded">I think wc3 reforged is very flawed. However with the amount of people giving this game a 0/10 i can't really take those "reviews" seriously. <br>This game is NOT a 0/10 game. <br> <br>I personally picked it up just before it fully released. Somwhere in the beta, like many players warcraftIII was my favorite game growing up, mainly for the custom games. <br> <br>Contrary to what many people here claim the classic version of the game was borderline unplayable before reforged. small playerbase, constant crashes, ect. Since reforged i've still had some crashes but notibally less. Most of my disconects were my internet falling off instead of the game fatal error'ing on me. This for sure wasn't the case when i still played classic a year or two back. In classic i could almost never get a good game in. <br> <br>A lot of content got scrapped. For example reconecting to the game was promised at one point but not implemented. Just like many things were scrapped afterwards. <br>The activision move to copyright custom maps is really terrible aswell. honestly someone should fire whoever makes these decisions. <br> <br>Reforged it'self however has been amazing as a secondary game for me. I've relived some of the fun i've had in the past and for the first time really played the campaign seriously. <br> <br>I don't remember how it was when i played this in classic but it never felt quite the same as it did in reforged. I LOVED the campaign. for the first time in my life i really connected to the story and that's honestly quite fun. <br> <br>I almost never completely play a game start to end but wc3 reforged was a blast for me personally. <br> <br>i don't remember there being this many missions. <br>Here's a small summary of my thoughts: <br> <br>Contrary to what many people here claim: <br>-custom games performance has improved ALOT. no more automatic hosting bots and 10k ping games that were the result of cross server mergings. And way less desyncs. <br>-Still some of the same bugs however, desyncs do still happen sometimes, reconnecting is still not added. <br> <br>-New models look really nice. there are a TON of them <br>-24 player maps are pretty fun and they still fill up decently right now, eras zombie invasion with 24 players playing as denmark or morocco is amazing! <br>-The Campaign is more fun than it ever was before. For the first time in my life i really loved playing through it. I haven't had this much of a blast playing a campaign since dishonered II. The story might still be the same but on reforged for the first time it got through to me. <br>-Non custom PVP seems to be ruined. I personally never really played that too much but i know others do. However in all honesty before reforged only a few hundred players ever played classic pvp wc3 and most of those are way to good to have fun at it anyway. <br> <br>Final thoughts: <br> <br>It's honestly been a joy to see my favorite game of all time be playable in better graphics with newer models and so on. While the gameplay might still be most of the same warcraft 3 is a timeless game. Theres a reason we were still playing before reforged released. I am personally very happy that blizzard made this. While the execution hasn't been that great the campaign is amazing and custom games seem to function better. <br>I hope they patch in some of the things they promised before, and maybe add some scrapped functions again. <br> <br>I hope blizzard isn't discouraged to keep working on this game and over time improve it. If they ditch this here this would be a "failure" but there is a LOT of potential to work with here. Alot of the decisions made were good. They should take that and give us some of the features they initially promised but scrapped along the way. There are a ton of people still playing. While it's currently rated as 0.6/10 it's definitely not what people are taking into account since alot of us are enjoying it alot still.</span><span class="blurb_etc">…</span> <span class="toggle_expand_collapse toggle_expand">Expand</span></span> 
                        </div> 
                       </div>

                  <div class="review_btm review_btm_r">

                    <div class="review_top review_top_r">

                       <div class="review_section">

                           <a href="/user/Good_Critic">Good_Critic</a> 
                          </div> 
                          <div class="date">
                           Mar 11, 2020
                          </div>

                         <div class="review_grade"> 
                          <div class="metascore_w user medium game negative indiv">
                           0
                          </div>

                        <div class="review_body"> 
                         <strong class="bold"> This review contains spoilers<span class="toggle_text_visibility">, click expand to view</span>. </strong> 
                         <span class="inline_expand_collapse inline_collapsed" id="review_blurb_10951734"><span class="blurb blurb_collapsed"></span><span class="blurb blurb_expanded">Warcraft 3 was my favourite game of all time and I was super hyped for Warcraft Reforged. Unfortunately Reforged turned out to be a buggy mess, several of the models look even worse than the original, a defeat screen would come up occasionally, ruining the campaign for no reason and worst of all some levels wouldn't even open up. Still this doesn't begin to describe the problems with this game. <br>For some reason they thought it was a good idea to balance a game that was almost two decades old, the new hero models look all over the place and nothing like the original and to top it off they decided that the Wow-aesthetic was better than the original Warcraft style. Regardless, even with that it wouldn't have been that bad. <br> <br>But it gets Worse <br> <br>So much worse. <br> <br>The bugs for some reason prevent people from playing the original Warcraft 3 so you had to buy reforged, then they decided everyone needed to download the new reforged game and increase my just-at-few-GB game into a more than twenty Gb game. I live in a country with pretty damn poor internet so it took me almost 4 days to download the thing. <br>And even when i did, I coulkdn't join anyones games initially, I couldn't play single player melee and I couldn't finish the campaign after randomly getting booted out of the games. <br> <br>And finally the worst part of all this: <br>Custom games are dead <br>Reforged killed almost all the custom maps so they couldn't be played. <br>And to top it off they introduced a EULA that prevented people from making custom maps. <br>Custom Maps are ruined. <br>The chances of people fixing all of the lost maps (that were also deleted from my computer, thank god I kept a backup) are pretty damn abyssal, not to mention all thge fan maps, like Dragon Ball Z tribute or all those Naurto dotas. <br> <br>Blizzard has actually ruined my favourite game for what was merely meant to be a cash grab. <br>All they had to do was make it so we could have Better models, instead they decided to go all out and beat Bethesda Creation club idea. Imagined if they introduced a Skyrim patch that deleted all mods and made it so all mods created are sole property of Bethesda. <br>Blizzard killed one of the most popular RTS's on the planet so its no wonder they're getting negative reviews.</span><span class="blurb_etc">…</span> <span class="toggle_expand_collapse toggle_expand">Expand</span></span> 
                        </div> 
                       </div>

It would be one thing if the features that Reforged >Added< to the game were bad, however it just entirely broke a perfectly fine working old game. Many core features were removed, a lot of advertised content were straight up lies and they do not give any option to play the old version of the game under any circumstance. <br> <br>fps drops, desync, auto loss, game crashes, unplayable custom maps etc. are just a few of the absolutely game breaking bugs. <br> <br>They have even removed the the option to play Reign of Chaos altogether (except the altered Reforged campaign), which means you can not play the old version in multiplayer / custom map at all. <br> <br>No proper communication and little to no chance that they will salvage the mess they have created. <br>To top it all off they actually charge 30 € just for the new graphics which in my eyes does not fit the original warcraft 3 design at all and is overall pretty disappointing.</span><span class="blurb_etc">…</span> <span class="toggle_expand_collapse toggle_expand">Expand</span></span>

                         <span class="inline_expand_collapse inline_collapsed" id="review_blurb_11089388"><span class="blurb blurb_collapsed">I got into the game when the Battle Chest was released many years back for the original WC3 with it's expansion. I was there for beta of reforged. I was there for release day. I watched it all unfold. <br>I could have done with the poor ui and the non-delivery of nearly all that was promised content-wise. <br> However, the game barely runs. In singleplayer, 4/5 times you go to play a mission</span><span class="blurb blurb_expanded">I got into the game when the Battle Chest was released many years back for the original WC3 with it's expansion. I was there for beta of reforged. I was there for release day. I watched it all unfold. <br>I could have done with the poor ui and the non-delivery of nearly all that was promised content-wise. <br> <br>However, the game barely runs. In singleplayer, 4/5 times you go to play a mission and on the following mission you will auto-defeat for no apparent reason. only way to fix it is to completely restart your game.. Worse even, you will crash to desktop quite often, especially when trying to play custom games online. What players have begun to refer to as "desynchs" happen all too often where you will sit at the "loading map" screen with the other players, after host has started the game, and you will sit and sit for mmm maybe 5-10 minutes (if you're lucky) and then the game will open the map for about 2 seconds where you will be suddenly crashed to desktop. WORSE EVEN sometimes you survive and get to see the other players suddenly disconnect at the start of your game and you and all the other players just sigh, attempt to remake and usually a repeat of the situation... Wc3 reforged is a readying experience for hell. <br> <br>The previous wc3 was killed. Servers are kaput. Profiles, gone. They offer an option hidden away in the ESC menu to attempt merging your old BNET profile into your new BNET 2.0 profile.. I tried to merge mine and it didn't work, God only knows how many others that's happened to. <br> <br>Ontop of that, they've again broken many of the previous (original) wc3 maps from custom games. There's just so many balls dropped here I cannot possibly say they deserve a good rating. They have truly made the game worse. Now is it "worse off"? No, because thankfully there has been a community revival. Hopefully that gives enough meaning to Blizzard to not lose sleep over. Not that I feel they really give a **** anymore anyways.. It's all been downhill since Blizz North dipped.</span><span class="blurb_etc">…</span> <span class="toggle_expand_collapse toggle_expand">Expand</span></span>

                        <div class="review_body"> 
                         <span class="inline_expand_collapse inline_collapsed" id="review_blurb_11084898"><span class="blurb blurb_collapsed">There are several major features outright removed in Reforged or simply not functioning because it’s in a buggy state including player profiles, ladder system and custom campaigns. The updated EULA also discourages map makers and modders to participate in making content for Reforged. The cutscenes for the most part are undone and severely lacking in the quality Blizzard was once known for.</span><span class="blurb blurb_expanded">There are several major features outright removed in Reforged or simply not functioning because it’s in a buggy state including player profiles, ladder system and custom campaigns. The updated EULA also discourages map makers and modders to participate in making content for Reforged. The cutscenes for the most part are undone and severely lacking in the quality Blizzard was once known for. The map textures are horrendous compared to the original game, the models are on par with Raid: Shadowlegends, this does not in any way feel like a homage to legendary classic Warcraft 3. Rather it feels like a slap in the face to Warcraft fans. <br> <br>If they didn’t ruin the original version of the game by merging the old client with this bug infested one, many people would not be complaining as much or refunding. I wouldn’t be complaining if they didn’t touch the original WC3 client. The issue is that they took out features from the original, released an unfinished product and downgraded classic WC3. Not even Bethesda was foolhardy enough to tamper with the original Skyrim when they released the special edition. <br> <br>This is an unmitigated disaster of a game, the developer "update" shows only the incompetency of the dev team leading this project further into the gutter. Rather than adding back basic features, fixing cutscenes and restoring the original client of WC3 they have doubled down on their justification for this mess of a game. I will no longer be supporting Blizzard games due to this disaster, you've ruined the game I enjoyed for most of my childhood. Reflect on what made the original WC3 a 9.2 user score and 92/100 critic score and how you've ended up as the worst rated game in history. <br> <br>Goodbye Blizzard, I would say we've had a good run but we obviously haven't.</span><span class="blurb_etc">…</span> <span class="toggle_expand_collapse toggle_expand">Expand</span></span>

                        </div> 
                       </div> 
                       <div class="review_body">
                         In the end it’s worth noting that when viewing a remake or remaster what needs to be taken into consideration is the source material, how it looks, feels, and plays. That is, in addition to the work carried out to recreate moments, update visuals, and change any of the presentation. To do otherwise would be silly, a terrible game with a wonderful remaster doesn’t warrant a high score. In the case of Warcraft III, the inverse to that is also true. So, what we end up with is something in-between. A classic reborn, in a package that doesn’t warrant all that much in the way of celebration. 
                       </div> 
                      </div>

                       </div>

                    </div>

                 </div> </li>

                         </div>

                         </div>
                        </div>

                         </div> 
                        </div> 
                       </div> 
                       <div class="review_body">
                         If you set your expectations a little lower, then Warcraft 3: Reforged is a game worth of your time and money. Sadly, for many of us out there, we were expecting a little more. 
                       </div>

                       <div class="review_body">
                         This new Warcraft III is still a brilliant strategy game, much prettier than before. But it’s also much more broken, full of irritating bugs and broken promises. What’s more, it murdered its older brother.
